messages.content: comfyui-mask-util is a custom node or plugin in ComfyUI that provides utilities for working with masks.
What are the two main categories of nodes in comfyui-mask-util?
The two main categories of nodes in comfyui-mask-util are mask generation and mask processing.
What does the Ellipse Mask node in comfyui-mask-util do?
The Ellipse Mask node in comfyui-mask-util generates an elliptical mask. It takes width, height, and AA (antialiasing) as inputs and outputs a mask.
How does the Mask Blend node in comfyui-mask-util work?
The Mask Blend node in comfyui-mask-util blends two masks together using a specified blend mode. It takes mask1, mask2, and blend_mode as inputs and outputs the blended mask.
What is the purpose of the Mask Dilate node in comfyui-mask-util?
The Mask Dilate node in comfyui-mask-util applies dilation to a mask, which expands the white areas. It takes a mask and iterations as inputs and outputs the dilated mask.
How can the Mask Erode node in comfyui-mask-util be used?
The Mask Erode node in comfyui-mask-util can be used to erode a mask, which expands the black areas. It takes a mask and iterations as inputs and outputs the eroded mask.
What does the Mask Invert node in comfyui-mask-util do?
The Mask Invert node in comfyui-mask-util inverts a mask, swapping the white and black areas. It takes a mask as input and outputs the inverted mask.
